channel.title: In the news on Gavin Rozzi
channel.description: Recent content in In the news on Gavin Rozzi

item.description: I spoke with NJ Tech Weekly’s Esther Surden on the impact of OPRAmachine

item.description: Responding to an attorney’s commentary about OPRAmachine’s impact on crime victim privacy

item.title: Interview with PrincetonInfo
item.description: I was interviewed by PrincetonInfo about my work modernizing public records with OPRAmachine

item.description: Why we’re suing Monmouth County for violating OPRA

item.title: Interview with AEA-NJ Newsletter
item.description: I was interviewed about my work with OPRA and public records for the August, 2018 edition of the newsletter of the Association of Environmental Authorities of New Jersey, which represents local and county utilities authorities.
